title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
description: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

title: Chariots of Fire
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: Two British track athletes, one a determined Jew and the other a devout Christian, compete in the 1924 Olympics.

title: Das Boot
description: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth and sheer terror.

title: On Golden Pond
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: Norman is a curmudgeon with an estranged relationship with his daughter Chelsea. At Golden Pond, he and his wife agree to care for Billy, the son of Chelsea's new boyfriend, and a most unexpected relationship blooms.

title: Reds
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A radical American journalist becomes involved with the Communist revolution in Russia, and hopes to bring its spirit and idealism to the United States.

title: Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior
description: In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline-rich community escape a horde of bandits.

title: The Evil Dead
description: Five friends travel to a cabin in the woods, where they unknowingly release flesh-possessing demons.

title: Body Heat
description: In the midst of a searing Florida heat wave, a woman convinces her lover, a small-town lawyer, to murder her rich husband.

title: Blow Out
description: A movie sound recordist accidentally records the evidence that proves that a car accident was actually a murder and consequently finds himself in danger.

title: Escape from New York
description: In 1997, when the U.S. president crashes into Manhattan, now a giant maximum security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in to rescue him.

title: Gallipoli
description: Two Australian sprinters face the brutal realities of war when they are sent to fight in the Gallipoli campaign in Turkey during World War I.

title: Thief
description: An expert safecracker wants to make one last big score before settling down with his girlfriend, but gets entangled with the mob.

title: My Dinner with Andre
description: Two old friends meet for dinner; as one tells anecdotes detailing his experiences, the other notices their differing worldviews.

title: Time Bandits
description: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

title: Excalibur
description: Merlin the wizard helps Arthur Pendragon unite the Britons around the Round Table of Camelot, even as forces conspire to tear it apart.

title: An American Werewolf in London
description: Two American college students on a walking tour of Britain are attacked by a werewolf that none of the locals will admit exists.

title: Mephisto
description: A German stage actor finds unexpected success and popularity by the popularity of his performance in a Faustian play as the Nazis take power.

title: Pixote
description: The life of a young street kid in Sao Paulo who escapes from a reform school and gets involved in drug dealing, theft and violence.

title: Diva
description: A young opera-loving mailman gets involved with an opera singer, a corrupt policeman, and a mob boss in this stylish French thriller.

title: The Professional
description: A French secret agent is betrayed by his government and returns to Paris to seek revenge.

title: Garde à vue
description: On New Year's Eve, a prominent lawyer is questioned by police about the rape and murder of two young girls.

title: Man of Iron
description: In 1980 Poland, a radio reporter is sent to Gdansk to dig up dirt on a strike leader, but begins to sympathize with the solidarity movement.

title: Lola
description: In 1950s West Germany, a strait-laced building commissioner falls in love with a brothel singer, unaware she is the mistress of a corrupt developer.

title: Coup de Torchon
description: In 1938 French West Africa, a weak-willed police chief decides to kill everyone who has ever tormented him.

title: Three Brothers
description: Three brothers return to their southern Italian village for their mother's funeral and confront their pasts and futures.

title: Muddy River
description: In post-war Osaka, a young boy befriends the son of a woman working on a houseboat, leading to a poignant look at friendship and class differences.

title: Gregory's Girl
description: An awkward Scottish teenager falls for the new girl on the school football team, leading to humorous romantic entanglements.

title: Prince of the City
description: A New York City narcotics detective agrees to cooperate with a commission investigating police corruption, but finds himself in over his head.

title: Southern Comfort
description: During a training exercise in the Louisiana bayou, a squad of National Guardsmen angers local Cajuns and finds themselves fighting for their lives.

title: Quest for Fire
description: Three tribesmen go on a quest to find fire in prehistoric times, encountering various dangers and other tribes along the way.

title: Ragtime
description: A young black pianist becomes embroiled in the lives of an upper-class white family in early 1900s New York City.

title: Absence of Malice
description: A liquor wholesaler is accused of murder by a reporter based on a leak from a federal prosecutor.

title: Arthur
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A drunken playboy stands to lose a wealthy inheritance when he falls for a woman his family doesn't like.

title: The French Lieutenant's Woman
description: Dual stories of a Victorian-era affair and the actors playing the roles in a modern film production.

title: Scanners
description: A scientist sends a man with extraordinary psychic powers to hunt down others like him who are using their abilities for evil.

title: The Fox and the Hound
description: Two childhood friends, a fox and a hound puppy, struggle to preserve their friendship despite their emerging instincts and the surrounding social pressures demanding them to be adversaries.

title: Heavy Metal
description: A glowing green orb terrifies a young girl with a collection of stories of dark fantasy, eroticism and horror.

title: For Your Eyes Only
description: James Bond is assigned to find a missing British vessel equipped with a weapons encryption device and prevent it from falling into enemy hands.

title: The Beyond
description: A young woman inherits an old hotel in Louisiana where, following a series of supernatural accidents, she learns that the building was built over one of the entrances to Hell.

title: The House by the Cemetery
description: A researcher moves his family to an old house near a cemetery, where they are terrorized by a mysterious creature inhabiting the basement.

title: Ms. 45
description: A timid mute seamstress goes on a killing spree against men after being raped twice in one day.

title: Cutter's Way
description: After witnessing a murder, a slacker and his Vietnam vet friend investigate the case when the police show no interest.

title: Modern Romance
description: A film editor tries to win back his ex-girlfriend while dealing with his own neuroses and jealousy.

title: Lion of the Desert
description: In 1929, Italian fascist dictator Benito Mussolini appoints General Rodolfo Graziani to suppress the Libyan resistance led by Omar Mukhtar.

title: The Prodigal Son
description: A young man, who believes he is a martial arts master, discovers his father has been paying his opponents to lose. He then seeks out a real master to learn proper kung fu.

title: The Great Muppet Caper
description: Kermit, Gonzo, and Fozzie are reporters who travel to Britain to interview a rich victim of jewel thieves and help her along with her secretary, Miss Piggy.

title: Pennies from Heaven
description: A sheet music salesman in Depression-era Chicago dreams of opening his own record store but falls into a life of despair.

title: Whose Life Is It Anyway?
description: A sculptor paralyzed from the neck down contests his hospital treatment and demands the right to die.

title: Eye of the Needle
description: A German spy is stranded on a remote island off the coast of Scotland during WWII, where he becomes involved with a lonely woman.

title: True Confessions
description: Two brothers, a priest and a cop, are drawn together after the brutal murder of a prostitute in 1940s Los Angeles.

title: Ticket to Heaven
description: A man is lured into a religious cult, and his friends and family try to deprogram him.

title: Smash Palace
description: A race car driver's obsession with cars destroys his marriage and leads him to take desperate measures to keep his daughter.
